SageTVPlugin.Name: SageTV Sagex API Extensions (sagex-api)
SageTVPlugin.Description: SageTV API Wrappers with Remote API capabilities
SageTVPlugin.Author: stuckless
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
9.2.8 * Added support for api's added since 9.0 (mostly related to Person and SD EPG) * Updated generate api to support the new javadocs format that removed frame support * note: all api's have been regenerated as of this version 9.2.6 * Build for Github sources and Jetty 9 9.1.7 * RMI is now stateless to avoid memory leaks * removed deprecated and legacy RPC connectors
9.0.0 * Upgraded to SageTV 9
